name: Ironkraft: Road to Hell
summary: Ironkraft - Road to Hell is a fast paced 2.5D side-scrolling car-brawler with an alternative World War II story - Zombies, Nazis, Aliens and maximum craziness included! In a post-apocalyptic vehicle driven universe where only a few dare to step on the road, the fate of the world lies in your hands.
